title: Mothers And Daughters (Full Movie) Drama | 2016 | Selma Blair, Susan Sarandon, Sharon Stone

sources.title: Mothers And Daughters (Full Movie) Drama | 2016 | Selma Blair, Susan Sarandon, Sharon Stone
sources.description:
With an all-star cast of Susan Sarandon, Sharon Stone, Courteney Cox, Christina Ricci, and Selma Blair! Photographer Rigby Gray captures uplifting stories of motherhood, inspiring a decision even she wouldn't expect

Directed by Paul Duddridge
2016
Starring: Christina Ricci, Susan Sarandon, Courteney Cox, Sharon Stone, Selma Blair, Luke Mitchell

Edited for YouTube ad standards
